    • Method Detail

      • forModel

        @Context
@Nonnull
public static <M extends com.google.protobuf.Message,​RI> CollapsedMessageCodec<M,​RI> forModel​(M instance,
                                                                                                          ModelDeserializer<RI,​M> deserializer)
        Create a collapsed message codec which adapts the provided builder to CollapsedMessage and back. These "collapsed" messages follow the framework-defined protocol for serializing hierarchical data.
        Type Parameters:
        M - Model type for which we will construct or otherwise resolve a collapsed message codec.
        Returns:
        Collapsed message codec bound to the provided message type.

        @Nonnull
public ModelSerializer<Model,​CollapsedMessage> serializer()
        Acquire an instance of the ModelSerializer attached to this adapter. The instance is not guaranteed to be created fresh for this invocation.
        Specified by:

      • instance

        @Nonnull
public Model instance()
        Description copied from interface: ModelCodec
        Retrieve the default instance stored with this codec. Each Message with a paired ModelCodec retains a reference to its corresponding default instance.
        Specified by:
